text: Deception is a 2003 film starring Debi Mazar, Karina Lombard, Jack Langedijk and Marc Lavoine. ==Plot== Unscrupulous Margaret, whose rich father bankrupted her family and committed suicide, uses her French gigolo boytoy Robert to swindle the fortune from her childhood friend Janet and her wealthy father Max. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2003 films Category:2003 thriller films
title: Deception (2003 film)
